page.title: 03CLUBS HOPE PRE-SCHOOL PLAY
page.content: GROUP. In such a rural community a pre-school playgroup is very well supported, there being 24 children on the books at the end of the Summer Term 1985.As well as enabling the children to mix, it is also a place for Mums to meet each week and have a cup of coffee and a chat. There are many different activities for the children,sit and ride toys,slide,trampoline and many table games,also many artistic outlets,painting(which can be very messy),plastercine,collage and drawing. The Mums pay 60p per child each morning and the children enjoy milk and biscuits before going home. The playgroup is affiliated to Shrewsbury Playgroup Association
